channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: « Ubisoft tel qu’on le connait n’existe plus » : 6 jeux annulés, studios fermés, restructuration – Ubisoft fait son grand reboot
item.description: C'est le grand chamboulement pour Ubisoft. La firme annonce une immense restructuration. Plusieurs jeux sont annulés, des studios ferment et les employés n'auront plus le droit au télétravail.

item.title: Annulations et reports de jeux, fermetures de studio, réorganisation : l’électrochoc Ubisoft
item.description: Ubisoft, le géant français du jeu vidéo, opère une réorganisation majeure et s'apprête à vivre quelques mois difficiles, entre fermetures de studios, reports et annulations de jeux. Une transformation en profondeur nécessaire, selon la direction, pour « reprendre son leadership créatif » et provoquer un rebond.

item.title: Meta is expanding ads to all users globally
item.description: Threads has grown enough for Meta to fully integrate it into its advertising machine. On Wednesday, the company said that, with the platform now hosting 400 million monthly active users, ads are expanding globally to all users. The inevitable move follows a test in 30 countries early last year.Ads on Threads are powered by Meta's AI-powered advertising system. They'll use the "same level of personalization" (i.e., tracking and profiling) as Facebook and Instagram. Image, video and carousel ad formats will all appear natively in Threads feeds.Meta said the ad expansion will begin next week, but...

item.title: Blue Origin’s satellite internet network TeraWave will move data at 6Tbps
item.description: The network will be designed for enterprise, data center, and government customers and could offer an alternative to SpaceX's Starlink service.

item.title: Hackers have finally made sophisticated AI generated malware – this AI virus was functional in a matter of days and mimicked the work of a three dev teams working 50 hours a week
item.description: VoidLink malware was created by a single developer using an AI agent to do the work of three development teams.

item.title: Zipline charts drone delivery expansion with $600M in new funding
item.description: The startup plans to expand to at least four new U.S. states in 2026.

item.title: For All Mankind returns on March 27 for a fifth season
item.description:
Apple TV+ has become one of the best streaming services for sci-fi, with hits like Pluribus, Severance, Foundation and many more. There are so many shows that it's easy to forget the one that started it all. For All Mankind was the platform's very first attempt at sci-fi and it's finally coming back after two years for season five on March 27. The next season will run for ten episodes on a weekly basis. It concludes on May 29, with new installments dropping each Friday.
What follows are some slight spoilers for the show, so read with caution. The streamer dropped a short teaser to announce th...

item.title: It’s Time for Nvidia to Prove It Can Do More Than Graphics Cards for PCs
item.description: This may be the moment when ARM really takes off on PCs, though it couldn't come at a worse time.

item.title: TCL Knocks $1,000 off One of Our Favorite Mid-Range TVs
item.description: The 65-inch QM8K sees a massive discount, with equally generous markdowns on larger models.

item.title: This Adorable Good Boy Just Got Rare, Life-Saving Brain Surgery
item.description: Six-year-old Woody has recovered well enough to take his daily walks again.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 battery pack leak points to Qi2 charging support
item.description: It looks like Samsung is preparing to launch a new Qi2 battery pack for the upcoming Galaxy S26, which is rumored to support the upgraded charging standard. A report from Winfuture shows off leaked images of what appears to be the new accessory, outfitted with a magnetic Qi2 charging ring that delivers up to 15W […]

item.title: CFOs are now getting their own 'vibe coding' moment thanks to Datarails
item.description: For the modern CFO, the hardest part of the job often isn't the math—it's the storytelling. After the books are closed and the variances calculated, finance teams spend days, sometimes weeks, manually copy-pasting charts into PowerPoint slides to explain why the numbers moved.Today, 11-year-old Israeli fintech company Datarails announced a set of new generative AI tools designed to automate that "last mile" of financial reporting, effectively allowing finance leaders to "vibe code" their way to a board deck.Launching today to accompany the firm's newly announced $70 million Series C funding ro...

item.title: Amazon is adding AI-powered assistant to One Medical
item.description: Amazon is introducing an AI-powered assistant to One Medical, the tech-forward primary care provider it acquired in 2023. Dubbed 'Health AI,' Amazon says the tool "provides 24/7 personalized health guidance based on your medical records." The company says Health AI can explain lab results, help manage medications, and book appointments for patients. Amazon also says it can "analyze images" but doesn't specify whether this means medical imaging or user uploaded photos. While the company specifically says the tool "complements, but does not replace," a patient's healthcare provider, it also vagu...

item.title: Surveillance and ICE Are Driving Patients Away From Medical Care, Report Warns
item.description: A new EPIC report says data brokers, ad-tech surveillance, and ICE enforcement are among the factors leading to a “health privacy crisis” that is eroding trust and deterring people from seeking care.

item.title: OpenEvidence hits $12B valuation, with new round led by Thrive, DST
item.description: The medical info database has doubled in valuation since last raise in October, despite encroachment from model makers.

item.title: Netflix Just Made All Your James Bond Dreams Come True
item.description: Basically every Bond film, from 'Dr. No' to 'No Time to Die,' is now on the streamer.

item.title: I've seen most of 2026's new robot vacuums, and these are the 2 models I can't wait to try
item.description: These are my hot tips for the best robot vacuums of 2026.

item.title: The Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake among six games canceled by Ubisoft
item.description: Two high-profile upcoming Ubisoft games have been starting to look more and more like vaporware with each passing year. One of them is Beyond Good & Evil 2, which we were assured is still in development last year. The other is the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake, which is now officially canceled, along with five other games on Ubisoft’s release slate. The news came in a media briefing attended virtually by VGC, in which the French company also announced delays to seven other games as part of a major restructuring. As reported by VGC, the only canceled game currently named by Ubisoft...

item.title: Amazon has launched a massive sale ahead of Presidents' Day —here are 21 deals I'd buy now, including 50% off appliances, TVs, heaters, and more
item.description: Amazon has launched a huge sale ahead of Presidents' Day, and I'm rounding up my 21 favorite deals to buy now, including TVs, appliances, heaters, and more.

item.title: Driving theory test cheats are using Bluetooth earpieces and hidden phones to pass — and after my recent nightmare, I’m not surprised
item.description: The number of learner drivers caught cheating in their driving tests has skyrocketed in the UK as candidates face long waiting times.

item.title: Dépendance aux réseaux sociaux | Snapchat conclut un accord avec une plaignante américaine
item.description: Snapchat a conclu un accord pour clore des poursuites qui devaient le voir comparaître fin janvier aux côtés d’Instagram, TikTok et YouTube, dans le premier d’une série de procès aux États-Unis sur l’impact des réseaux sociaux sur la santé mentale.

item.title: Volvo EX60 vs Audi Q6 e-tron et Tesla Model Y vs BMW iX3 : qui est le meilleur aujourd’hui ?
item.description: 66 500 €. C'est le ticket d'entrée du nouveau Volvo EX60. À ce tarif, et jusqu'à plus de 82 000 € pour la version intéressante. Volvo ne cherche pas à démocratiser l'électrique. La marque vise la gorge des premiums allemands. Et avec 810 km d'autonomie, elle a les crocs.

item.title: The company Americans say is the best place to work in 2026 isn’t who you think
item.description: Workers praised flexibility, growth, and culture at a company far removed from Silicon Valley. For as much as we heard about AI in the past year, the top two best places to work in the U.S. are decidedly AI-free.

item.title: Volvo’s EX60 Promises 400-mile Range in a More Competitive EV Climate
item.description: HugInCore, integrated AI, and Nvidia-powered infotainment are some of the features in Volvo's new electric SUV.

item.title: Volvo EX60 Electric SUV: Range, Specs, Availability, and Price
item.description: The Swedish brand’s latest computer-packed EV hopes to take on and beat the BMW iX3. But we’re more excited about the new seat belt.

item.title: Volvo aims for an EV reset with the new EX60 crossover
item.description: Volvo's EX60, with fast-charging capabilities and a brand-new electric architecture, made its official debut today, with the Swedish automaker positioning the crossover EV as a new direction for its battery-powered lineup. With up to 400 miles of estimated range and an 800-volt architecture for ultra-fast charging, the EX60 feels like a concerted effort by Volvo […]...

item.title: Anthropic's official Git MCP server had some worrying security flaws - this is what happened next
item.description: Bugs could be chained for devastating effect, but Anthropic stepped up.

item.title: Volvo EX60 SUV preview: 400-mile range, 670 hp and Google Gemini onboard
item.description: Volvo hasn't exactly had a great run of EVs lately. The rollout of its flagship EX90 was stymied out of the gate by a bevy of software glitches. The EX30, meanwhile, was too expensive when it launched — the promised $35,000 model was incompatible with the currently chaotic global tariff situation.Now, it's time for a new generation of EV from Volvo, one that's radically different at its core with a gigacast frame, a much higher-density battery and enough digital and literal horsepower to impress the most jaded of automotive enthusiasts. Mix in high-performance chipsets from both NVIDIA and Qua...

item.title: 5 reasons why cutting back on alcohol is so hard
item.description: Anyone reviewing their relationship with alcohol should look at what I call the three Cs: consumption, consequences, and control. Below, Charles Knowles shares five key insights from his new book, Why We Drink Too Much: The Impact of Alcohol on Our Bodies and Culture.

item.title: Volvo EX60 : 800 km d’autonomie et une ceinture de sécurité next gen qui peut tout changer ?
item.description: Volvo lance l’EX60 : 800 km d’autonomie, vitesse de recharge record, ceinture de sécurité miracle. Le nouveau SUV électrique semble disposer de nombreux atouts. On a décidé d’aller le voir en vrai pour le vérifier. Découverte.

item.title: Volvo dévoile l’EX60 : prix, date et fiche technique du nouveau rival du Model Y et des Allemands
item.description: Après un EX30 imparfait et un EX90 retardé, Volvo joue sa carte maîtresse : l'EX60. C'est le remplaçant spirituel du XC60, le best-seller de la marque.

item.title: The RetroBox is a new TV/VCR combo — yes, really — with a classic design and modern tech including HDMI ports
item.description: Who needs 4K when you can watch a grainy old VHS instead?

item.title: Cet émetteur et récepteur Ugreen permet de projeter votre PC sur un téléviseur et perd 14 % de son prix chez Amazon pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Grâce à un signal projeté sur 50 m et une compatibilité avec la 5G pour éviter les soucis de connexion, cet émetteur et récepteur de Ugreen s'affiche comme un excellent moyen de projeter votre ordinateur sur un plus grand écran. Amazon profite des soldes d'hiver pour retirer 14 % de son prix et il tombe à 58,58 euros.

item.title: Ubisoft cancels Prince of Persia remake as part of major reorganization
item.description: Ubisoft is announcing a major reorganization, and with the changes, it's refocusing its portfolio and canceling some games, including the beleaguered remake of Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. With the reorganization, Ubisoft will focus its efforts on big open worlds and live service games and is making "accelerated investments" in "player-facing Generative AI." […]...

item.title: Configurations PC pour Marathon : tout ce qu’il faut pour le faire tourner
item.description: Le fameux shooter d'extraction façon Bungie a enfin une date de sortie, heureusement toute proche. Les joueurs PC ont aussi appris à quelle sauce ils seront mangés pour le faire tourner sur leur machine...

item.title: Elon Musk is reportedly trying to take SpaceX public
item.description: Elon Musk is reportedly looking to finally take SpaceX public after years of resistance, according to sources who spoke to The Wall Street Journal. The company has long said it wouldn't choose an IPO until it had established a presence on Mars. That isn't happening anytime soon. So why now? Company insiders have suggested it's because Musk wants to build AI data centers in space. Google recently announced it was looking into putting a data center in space, with test launches scheduled for 2027. Musk reportedly wants to beat his rival to the punch, but SpaceX would need the billions of dollars ...

item.title: Chris Pratt’s Sci-Fi Movies, Ranked
item.description: The 'Guardians of the Galaxy' and 'Jurassic World' star has been in a lot of sci-fi beyond 'Mercy,' out this week.

item.title: ElevenLabs made an AI album to plug its music generator
item.description: ElevenLabs has released an album of AI-generated songs in its latest attempt to separate itself from the ethical concerns surrounding AI music. The Eleven Album aims to showcase "how artists can use AI to expand their creative range while maintaining full authorship and commercial rights," according to ElevenLabs. ElevenLabs is using the album to market […]...

item.title: Mercy review: Chris Pratt's new AI sci-fi thriller is so haphazard, you'll wonder if ChatGPT could do a better job of writing it
item.description: AI is taking over the world, but what if it swallowed the entire legal system too? Chris Pratt finds out in Mercy, but watching this film is more punishment than any generated court could dole out.

item.title: Netflix says a big mobile app redesign is coming – and subscribers are bracing themselves for another UI nightmare
item.description: There's a new Netflix update coming to mobile, and it's bringing a new vertical feed to your account.

item.title: Et si tout venait… d’un second Big Bang ? Une théorie sidérante pour expliquer la matière noire
item.description: Le rayonnement fossile prouve que le Big Bang quelques secondes après son début avait produit un plasma incroyablement chaud de protons, neutrons et photons, sans oublier des électrons et des neutrinos. Le modèle cosmologique standard repose aussi sur l'hypothèse que ce plasma contenait des...

item.title: Soldes PC portables : le top 10 des offres sur les configurations gaming et bureautiques est ici !
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver 2026 battent encore leur plein avec la troisième démarque. Si vous pensiez que les meilleures affaires étaient déjà passées, détrompez-vous : plusieurs restent disponibles, notamment sur les laptops gaming et les ultraportables puissants pour le travail.
